description: Here, we presented a freely accessible easy-to-use web server that integrated more than 120 commonly used data visualization and graphing functions together, including heatmap, venn diagram, volcano plot, bubble plot, chromsome plot, circos plot, scatter plot, .... It can be run easily with all Web browsers, with a user-friendly graphical interface, users can paste your data directly into the input box according to the defined file format. Modification operations can be easily performed, and graphs can be generated in real time. The resulting graphs can be downloaded in bitmap (PNG or TIFF) or vector (PDF or SVG) format in publication quality.
name: SRplot
